you mean, what codec was used w/ the audio? no idea....
I would try to install all the gstreamer packages. Those might help some players.
at least this one: gstreamer0.8-ffmpeg
from the everyday usage guide: "Not all mpgs are created equal. If you are getting sound but no video with some mpgs, you probably need the ffmpeg libraries."
